name: BCC Student Searcher
description: Search for students in BCC's(bangkok christian college)  public database using their name, or student ID. This is a demo version of the app, so it may not work as expected. This app is not affiliated with BCC in any way.
author: Phat Lorthammakun

name: UwU Anticheat
description: UwU Anticheat is an anticheat for a minecraft server version 1.8.8 and 1.12.2 the anticheat focuses on blocking cheats with minimal false positives as posible. (this anticheat have been discontinued)
author: NotThatUwU (Phat Lorthammakun)

name: Advanced Data Path Finding
description: The "Advanced Data Path Finding" project is a tool to enables advanced data path finding through super advanced data structures and machine-learning AI algorithm. It is designed to provide a more flexible and customizable solution for data path finding than the old pathfinding algorithms. joke aside this project is supposed to be a joke and not be taken seriously.
author: Phat Lorthammakun
